Title:
Some of my very favourite astronomy acronyms:
VLT - Very Large Telescope 
ELT - Extremely Large Telescope
OWL - Overwhelmingly Large telescope
BIGASS - Bright Infrared Galaxy All Sky Survey
EGG - Evaporating Gaseous Globulae
Hot DOGs = Hot Dust-Obscured Galaxies
Creator: @AnnaGHughes

Title: You unsubscribed from our email list. Our unsubscribe donkey, Pepe, will begin his journey; your request should be processed in 4-6 weeks.

Title:
Morning routine:  
1\. Wake up.  
2\. Stretch.  
3\. Shake feelings of impending doom.  
4\. Coffee.  
5\. Breakfast.  
6\. Suppress despair.  
7\. Check Slack.

Title: The Programmers’ Credo: we do these things not because they are easy, but because we thought they were going to be easy

Title:
The FEYNMAN technique of learning:  
STEP 1 - Pick and study a topic  
STEP 2 - Explain the topic to someone, like a child, who is unfamiliar with the topic  
STEP 3 - Identify any gaps in your understanding   
STEP 4 - Review and Simplify!
Creator: @ProfFeynman

Title: Only idiots believe NASA is conducting secret missions. YOU CANT SECRETLY FIRE GIANT ROCKETS INTO SPACE BECAUSE EVERYONE CAN SEE SPACE.
Creator: @SarcasticRover

Title: I think my favorite part of every flight is during take off when the pilot screams “Bend to my will metal sky bird and take us to the big blueness!” and all the passengers chant “Sky bird! Sky bird!” To convince the plane to take off.
Creator: @travismcelroy

Title: Spaghetti code: confusing or poorly structured.  Ravioli code: neatly separated, but might too separated and thus hard to understand.  Lasagna code: code with easily distinguishable layers.  Campanelle code: built using a hipster framework almost no one has heard of.
Creator: @twostraws
